abstract: A conversation with The Times’s Supreme Court correspondent about how the chief justice fits into the impeachment trial.
lead_paragraph: Wednesday and Thursday, House managers and White House lawyers will answer questions submitted in writing by senators, who won’t be able to speak during the sessions. The questions will be read by Chief Justice John G. Roberts Jr., and will alternate between Democrats and Republicans.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
